name: discogs_scrape_master
description: Scrape a Discogs master release page. Returns title, artist, year, versions, and tracklist.

steps.code: const title = document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const artist = document.querySelector('h1 a')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const year = document.querySelector('[class*="year"], .profile .content')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const tracks = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.tracklist_track, tr[class*="track"]')).map(tr => ({ position: tr.querySelector('.tracklist_track_pos')?.textContent?.trim()||'', title: tr.querySelector('.tracklist_track_title a')?.textContent?.trim()||'', duration: tr.querySelector('.tracklist_track_duration')?.textContent?.trim()||'' })).filter(t=>t.title); const versions = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('table.versions tbody tr')).slice(0,20).map(row => ({ title: row.querySelector('a')?.textContent?.trim()||'', format: row.querySelector('td:nth-child(3)')?.textContent?.trim()||'', country: row.querySelector('td:nth-child(4)')?.textContent?.trim()||'' })); return { title, artist, year, tracklist: tracks, versions, url: window.location.href }
